title: Team Solo Killed [LFP]: Silver/Gold+ Looking for good players for every role!
body:
Hey, Team Solo Killed is still accepting members for the next season of Ranked 5's. If you're good, we want you. NA CST; practices are at 5pm every weekday. We play draft often, as we are trying to find the best synergy and team composition.

Usernamer (IGN):
Season 4 Rank:
Age (Optional):
Role:
Main 3 Champions:
Skype (Yes/No):
Timezone:
Strengths:

Weaknesses:

replies.body:
Usernamer (IGN): R3ddagger
Season 4 Rank: Gold 3
Age (Optional): - 15
Role: Top
Main 3 Champions: Rumble Jayce Gnar
Skype (Yes/No): Yes
Timezone: EST
Strengths: Mastery of champions, Aggression in lane

Weaknesses: Champion pool/2 trick pony in toplane

Usernamer (IGN): Mikalos
Season 4 Rank: S3
Age (Optional): 18
Role: ADC
Main 3 Champions: Ezreal, Corki, Varus
Skype (Yes/No): Yes
Timezone: CT
Strengths: I can keep up with cs and listen to my support and make fast decisions with him. I often play better when i play slowly instead of aggressive so thats my play style.

Weaknesses: Sometimes I get too far up and forget to check map, causing my death and sometimes my teammates, and may need to work on positioning in teamfights.

Usernamer (IGN): OG LoL
Season 4 Rank: P5
Age (Optional): 17
Role: Jung
Main 3 Champions: Lee ( I main him) Vi and I can play really anyone
Skype (Yes/No): yes
Timezone: EST
Strengths: Shot-Calling and mechanics

Weaknesses: Can be a bit too agressive at times

Usernamer (IGN): corrosa (main IGN is jimmyreborn)
Season 4 Rank: Gold 3
Age (Optional): 20s
Role: support/adc
Main 3 Champions: sona,janna,morg,kalista,jinx,trist
Skype (Yes/No): yes
Timezone: central
Strengths: I am the support to c9 analyst OFG saiph. I do coaching for a few league websites. I have a 80% win rate and up on all 10 of my accounts.

Weaknesses: I'm bad at top.

CharQueen
Silver II
Mid / Adc / Supp
Miss Fortune, Jinx, Zyra
No
PST ( 2 hours behind CST )
Lane safety, feed prevention

Map awareness, Ping use

Usernamer (IGN): ImTryingToLearn
Season 4 Rank: Gold 4 (Gold 2 currently)
Age (Optional): 17
Role: Midlane
Main 3 Champions: Xerath, LeBlanc, Azir (Can play many more)
Skype (Yes/No): Yes
Timezone: Central
Strengths: Good mechanics, good positioning, ability to carry.
Weaknesses: Very aggressive playstyle
